DataElement.preferredName: Beck Depression Inventory Seven Past Day Fatigue True Score Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric response to a questionnaire item asking an individual about statements about fatigue.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Beck Depression Inventory Seven Past Day Fatigue True Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A twenty-one question survey completed by a patient, with each answer scored on a scale of 0 to 3, designed to measure presence of depression._A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.:Before the present time.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._That state, following a period of mental or bodily activity, characterized by a lessened capacity for work and reduced efficiency or accomplishment, usually accompanied by a feeling of weariness, sleepiness, or irritability..:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A twenty-one question survey completed by a patient, with each answer scored on a scale of 0 to 3, designed to measure presence of depression.

Concepts.definition: A twenty-one question survey completed by a patient, with each answer scored on a scale of 0 to 3, designed to measure presence of depression.

Property.preferredDefinition: A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.:Past; before the present time.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :That state, following a period of mental or bodily activity, characterized by a lessened capacity for work and reduced efficiency or accomplishment, usually accompanied by a feeling of weariness, sleepiness, or irritability.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 6 and less than 8 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of six and one.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Overall tiredness and lack of energy.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools
